description:
The following three contents are available to access inside the game:
- 40th Anniversary Commemorative Book
You can browse through the changes made in the history of the "NOBUNAGA'S AMBITION" series, and materials when the games were in development can be seen.
- Officer Artbook
Officer graphics including the newly added officers in Awakening can be seen.
-Soundtracks
Music for "NOBUNAGA'S AMBITION: Awakening" is included.

How to Access
Access to the contents above under "Commemorative Book", "Artbook", and "Music" inside the "Gallery" command.

Note: The Officer Artbook and NOBUNAGA'S AMBITION 40th Anniversary Commemorative Book will be the Japanese version.
name: "NOBUNAGA'S AMBITION: Awakening" 40th Anniversary Commemorative Book, Officer Artbook, and Soundtrack
